analysis.description:
Withdrawable.withdrawERC20Token (/unique_chucks/38/0x1f6e6af195376fb39bb7fede37aa5fb28ac12b44.sol#53-60) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(to,token.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/38/0x1f6e6af195376fb39bb7fede37aa5fb28ac12b44.sol#56-60)

Reentrancy in RaindropClient.setMinimumHydroStakes (/unique_chucks/38/0x1f6e6af195376fb39bb7fede37aa5fb28ac12b44.sol#123-131):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(newMinimumHydroStakeUser <= (hydro.totalSupply() / 100 / 10)) (/unique_chucks/38/0x1f6e6af195376fb39bb7fede37aa5fb28ac12b44.sol#125)
	- require(bool)(newMinimumHydroStakeDelegatedUser <= (hydro.totalSupply() / 100)) (/unique_chucks/38/0x1f6e6af195376fb39bb7fede37aa5fb28ac12b44.sol#126-127)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- minimumHydroStakeDelegatedUser (/unique_chucks/38/0x1f6e6af195376fb39bb7fede37aa5fb28ac12b44.sol#130-131)
	- minimumHydroStakeUser (/unique_chucks/38/0x1f6e6af195376fb39bb7fede37aa5fb28ac12b44.sol#127-130)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/38/0x1f6e6af195376fb39bb7fede37aa5fb28ac12b44.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/38/0x1f6e6af195376fb39bb7fede37aa5fb28ac12b44.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_hydroTokenAddress' of RaindropClient.setHydroTokenAddress (/unique_chucks/38/0x1f6e6af195376fb39bb7fede37aa5fb28ac12b44.sol#121) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_address' of RaindropClient.getUserByAddress (/unique_chucks/38/0x1f6e6af195376fb39bb7fede37aa5fb28ac12b44.sol#148) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_address' of RaindropClient.isSigned (/unique_chucks/38/0x1f6e6af195376fb39bb7fede37aa5fb28ac12b44.sol#156) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_address' of RaindropClient._isSigned (/unique_chucks/38/0x1f6e6af195376fb39bb7fede37aa5fb28ac12b44.sol#165) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_address' of RaindropClient._isSignedPrefixed (/unique_chucks/38/0x1f6e6af195376fb39bb7fede37aa5fb28ac12b44.sol#174) is not in mixedCase
